title: Sound Taxi + KeyGen = Removes DRM from media!
description:
Sound Taxi is an awesome program used to strip media of DRM protection. Do you have a huge library on iTunes and cant transfer it to another machine? This will fix that.

You can also go download Rhapsody. Rhaposody is only about 14 bucks a mo but will let you download any music to your computer for offline listening. You can then run sound taxi to strip that music of its DRM and do what you want with it. Pretty simple. Dedicated downloads supper fast way to get what you want and as much of it as your hard drive can hold.

Please help me seed this file!
It is small at only 7.5 megs or so.
That is compressed. Uncompressed the file is still like 7.65.


Inhalation:

Open file with winZip or 7zip.

Extract files anywhere on C:

Run the installer. Install on C: (Will not run from anything other than C: due to the  keygen reg entries pointing at C: only)
DO NOT RUN THE PROGRAM OR YOU WILL HAVE TO START OVER!

Now run the KeyGen. This will make 3 registry entries and fill in the registration info.

Now run the program and point it at the folder containing the files you would like to convert and set up an output folder.

Enjoy!


SEED THIS! Share it! give it to your friends that use iTunes or Rhapsody!
Please note in the info file: you will be able to convert ANY kind of DRM not just Rhopsody (Real Player DRM) and iTunes.



Info File:
===============================================================================
SoundTaxi Platinum v1.3.5
-------------------------

More info:
 - http://www.soundtaxi.info/

Screenshot:
 - http://img187.imageshack.us/img187/9568/screenue8.gif


Description
-----------

Easily convert DRM protected music files and various audio files to unprotected MP3, CD, iPod and other MP3 player file formats at high speed and CD quality- legally.

SoundTaxi unprotects and converts music files from:

    * iTunes
    * Napster
    * Yahoo Music
    * MusicMatch
    * MSNMusic
    * MusicLoad
    * Rhapsody
    * MTV / urge
    * MusicNow
    * BuyMusic
    * AOL Music
    * Virgin Digital
    * Sony Connect
    * Beon Music
    * Peer Impact
    * iMusica
    * Wal-Mart
    * AOL MusicNow
    * connect-europe
    * akuma
    * Listen JP
    * ongen
    * hmv
    * Bigpond Music
    * Soundbuzz
    * digirama
    * imusica
    * cdigix
    * cingular mMode
    * puretracks
    * metro tunes
    * fnac


Supported file formats: (in protected/unprotected; out unprotected)

  	  wma 	  m4p 	  aac
  	  mp3 	  wav 	  ogg
  	  mp4 	  snd 	  aif
  	  any format Media Player supports

With just a few mouse clicks you can enjoy all your protected songs on iPod, any other MP3 player, CD player, mobile phone or PC - without any restrictions or DRM protection.

SoundTaxi is easy to install and use with a very handy and clear user interface.

It lets you choose the compression level and it preserves ID3 tags for artist, album, title names etc.

A batch mode and the drag&drop function for folders and files allow to convert and unprotect large music collections with just 1 click.

Feature list:

 - very easy to use and install

 - converts any song that can be played with Media Player to MP3, AAC, WAV etc
   for use with iPod, any other MP3 player, CD player, mobile phone or PC

 - unprotects practically all DRM audio files

 - unprotects and converts songs for use with iPod, any other MP3 player,
   CD player, mobile phone or PC

 - converted songs have NO DRM restriction anymore

 - preserves ID3 tags for artist, album, title names etc.

 - batch mode for converting or unprotecting large song collections

 - allows to convert complete folder structures and recreates these structures on output

 - selectable compression level and output format

 - very fast conversion, up to 13x the playback speed

 - can convert in HIFI and CD quality


System Requirements:
Windows XP x32 or Windows 2003 x32
256 Megabyte RAM
Microsoft\&#039;s MediaPlayer 7, 8, 9 or 10 installed
